title: riot help please.
body:
there's 2 duos smurfing in low levels and ruining the expecience of new players. 
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=wa%C3%ACf%C3%B9
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=tal%C3%ADyahbe%C3%ADfong
oh and forgot to mention, they are tryharding as well.

replies.body: If you feel like they were doing something toxic or otherwise harmful to the game we always encourage using the post game report button to shoot those reports our way!
